result.arabic_text: ذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ نَقُصُّهُۥ عَلَيۡكَۖ مِنۡهَا قَآئِمٞ وَحَصِيدٞ
result.translation: These are some of the stories of the towns that We relate to you; some are still standing, while others have been mowed down[54].
result.footnotes: [54] i.e., the remains of some towns are still standing while others are completely destroyed.
